Verify there are exactly 20 rows of data
Verify the 'Total Sales' value is '$1,500,000.00'
Submit an invalid form on 'https://www.contact.com'

Verify the error message 'Please fill in all required fields.' is visible, has color #DC3545, font size 14px, positioned 10px below the form with a left margin of 0px, background color #FFEEEE, and 12px padding
Verify the input fields with errors have a 1px solid #DC3545 border
Click the date input on 'https://www.booking.com'
Verify the date picker calendar is visible, occupies width 300px, and height 280px
Verify the currently selected date, '24', has background color #007BFF and font weight 700
Verify the 'Next Month' button is enabled and has an aria-label 'Next month'
Verify the month display shows 'October 2023' with font size 18px
Initiate a file upload on 'https://www.uploads.com/progress'
Verify the progress bar is visible, initially with width 0% and background color #CCCCCC
Verify as the upload progresses, the width increases up to 100% with a transition duration of 500ms
Verify the inner bar's background color is #28A745
Verify the percentage label displays 75% when the bar's width is 75%
Expand the first accordion item on 'https://www.faq.com'
Verify the content area for 'Question 1' becomes visible with a height transition animation lasting 300ms
Verify the associated arrow icon rotates 180 degrees
Verify the expanded content text 'Answer to Question 1...' has font size 15px and padding 16px
Verify the background color of the header for 'Question 1' is #F5F5F5 when active/selected
Open 'https://www.photosite.com/gallery'
Verify the main gallery image has source 'beach_sunset.jpg', rendered dimensions 1024x768px, loads within 1 second, and its alt text is 'Sunset over the beach'
Verify the 'Next Image' button is enabled and has a right position of 20px
Verify exactly 5 thumbnail images are displayed below, each 100px wide and 75px high
Verify the active/selected thumbnail has a 2px solid #007BFF border
Open 'https://www.support.com'
Hover over the 'Help' icon

Verify a tooltip is visible, centered above the icon (x,y coordinates relative to icon), has background color #333333, text color #FFFFFF, font size 12px, border radius 4px, text 'Need assistance?', 8px padding, and opacity 0.9
Move mouse away from the 'Help' icon
Verify the tooltip disappears
Click the 'Currency' dropdown on 'https://www.travelsite.com/book'
Verify the dropdown list expands, showing exactly 3 options
Verify the 'USD' option is active/selected
Verify each option item has a height of 36px and 10px padding
Verify the dropdown menu's background color is #FFFFFF and it has a 1px solid #CCCCCC border
Verify the currently selected value in the dropdown is 'USD'
Visit 'https://www.news.com/article'
Verify exactly 4 social share buttons are visible
Verify the 'Facebook' button has a background color of #3B5998, width 40px, and height 40px
Verify the icon within the 'Twitter' button has rendered dimensions 24x24px
Verify each share button has a right margin of 10px
Hover over the 'LinkedIn' button
Verify the 'LinkedIn' button's background color changes to #0077B5 on hover
Open 'https://www.mobileapp.com'
Resize the browser viewport to 360px width
Verify the main content area has width 100% of viewport and its padding is 16px
Verify the hero image's source is 'hero_mobile.jpg' and its rendered width is 360px
Verify the 'Product Grid' now displays 1 column instead of 3
Verify the product titles are text aligned center and have a font size of 16px
